attributes.action: provide some type of funding or loan for scottish students wishing to undertake a BPS accredited counselling psychology course
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All of the British psychological society accredited courses for counselling psychology are based in London or near London with expensive tuition fees. As yet there is no funding for students on these courses. It would be nice if something was available as those wishing to help others cannot get the qualifications they need to get into their chosen career.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
